text: @realDonaldTrump Hey fuckface. Kids are still in cages, black people are still being murdered by the fucking police, coronavirus is still infecting and killing people, people still haven’t been able to get their unemployment-SO NOONE GIVES A RATS ASS ABOUT WHATEVER THIS BS IS!!! #asshole
